comment: The sample provided to me was Platte Valley Whisky. The first sip had a strong ethanol taste, but if you let it sit for 10 minutes, it becomes a nice and enjoyable drink. It’s good and clean, but it lacks the flavors I crave for in a whisky.

My bottle doesn’t say moonshine. Just whiskey. Very clean and simple. Dusty corn flavors with a little sweetness.  Drink it for what it is. 100%corn. If you drink it expecting typical whiskey or bourbon flavors you’ll just be disappointed.
All corn! A decent way to get started in the whiskey world.

Pale straw in color. 
Simple corn whiskey on the nose.
Characterless in flavor with light heat.
This one's rough.   Only good for shooting.
